code: var baseUrl='https://api.mestobyleonid.nomoredomains.work';var headers={"Content-Type":"application/json"};var checkResponse=function checkResponse(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430, \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u0443\u0441 \u043E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0438 ".concat(response.status));};export var signUp=function signUp(password,email){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:headers,body:JSON.stringify({"password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};export var signIn=function signIn(password,email){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:headers,body:JSON.stringify({"password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};export var verifyUser=function verifyUser(jwt){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(jwt)}}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};
